Shader "pygments-shader" {
  SubShader {
    Pass {
      CGPROGRAM
      #pragma vertex vert
      #pragma fragment frag

      float4 vert(float4 vertex : POSITION) : SV_POSITION {
        return UnityObjectToClipPos(vertex);
      }

      fixed4 frag() : SV_Target {
        return fixed4(1.0, 0, 0, 1.0);
      }
      ENDCG
    }
  }
}
